item.title: Sea
item.description: INTRODUCTION Sea was released as the second box of HTB’s Season 6, Heist. With proper recon, it’s a very short box. Perhaps they will fix it after the season ends, but this box actually comes pre-exploited: to gain foothold, all you have to do is find the exploit and use it. It’s totally doable to figure out how to exploit it yourself though - that’s the method that I’ll outline in this walkthrough.
